sect1.title: General
sect1.para: The component ZKMEBINT is part of the ZV_Lib functionality and ensures backward compatibility of the OnlineRemoteUpdate (ORU) functions. This is a specific component for MEB platform which inform all ZK Lib components if the ORU update was done or not. ZKMEBINT component integrates the ZKMEBINT 3rd party library delivered by VW, with the other SWCs (for more details check the ZKMEBINT Dependencies diagram present in SWA) established through RTE.
